title: (x) The Evil Dead/Basement Jaxx logos - New Zelek {Mark S}
content:
I found this font on Dafont ( [http://www.dafont.com/slant.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20141006194106/http:/www.dafont.com/slant.font "http://www.dafont.com/slant.font")), but my guess is that it's not the original...  
Does anybody know if it is indeed a knock-off & what from?  
BTW, I knòw the "Evil Dead" one is customised, so there's no need to point that out to me ;-)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [EvilDead2.GIF](http://web.archive.org/web/20141006194106/http:/typophile.com/files/EvilDead2.GIF) | 84.7 KB |
| [BasementJaxx2.GIF](http://web.archive.org/web/20141006194106/http:/typophile.com/files/BasementJaxx2.GIF) | 7.47 KB |
author: ill sans

comments.content: It's an old Mecanorma (rub-down type) font called New Zelek.
Has it been digitized by your knowlegde?
